channel.title: Idea of an previos topic
channel.description:
Some of you maybe read http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,230401.0.html, well I got an idea. Isn't there a case for searching.
The 'search' option, if I'm right there should be one. And if so, shouldn't I be able to make a code if a specific ObjectID have been searched it spawns an NPC at a certain position or sends a message.
Thanks in advance.
Sincerly, Dealman

item.title: Idea of an previos topic
item.dc:creator: @huggies huggies
item.description:
@huggies wrote:

Some of you maybe read http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,230401.0.html, well I got an idea. Isn’t there a case for searching.

The ‘search’ option, if I’m right there should be one. And if so, shouldn’t I be able to make a code if a specific ObjectID have been searched it spawns an NPC at a certain position or sends a message.

Thanks in advance.

Sincerly,
Dealman

Read full topic
